General.Name: Taylor Wimpey plc
General.Description: Taylor Wimpey plc operates a residential developer in the United Kingdom and Spain. It builds and delivers various homes and communities. Taylor Wimpey plc was incorporated in 1935 and is based in High Wycombe, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Gate House, High Wycombe, United Kingdom, HP12 3NR
